name: FATAL FURY
description:
Released in 1991 and one of the longest-running series in the
fighting-game genre, this title introduced players to Terry Bogard, Andy
Bogard, and Joe Higashi. Select one of the three and visit many
locations as your chosen fighter engages in numerous street fights
around the fictional city of South Town. If you’re good enough, you’ll
eventually take on Billy Kane and then his boss, the notorious crime
lord Geese Howard. Use each fighter’s own finishing maneuver and battle
in two different planes on the screen, one in the foreground and the
other farther away in the background. The game also features a
two-player mode that is well known for its unique setup, which allows
fighters to both fight and help each other. Do you have what it takes to
win the King of Fighters tournament?
This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. See more Virtual Console games for Wii.
